scripts.watch-js: watchify js/index.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -v --debug
scripts.watch-styles: touch .temp/main.css & node-sass --watch styles/main.sass .temp/main.css & postcss --watch --use autoprefixer -o dist/main.css .temp/main.css
scripts.dev: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-styles & npm run serve
